imdb.plot outline: Nick Chou, Summer Meng (Aim High and In Time With You), and Huang Wei Ting (Aim High) star in a time traveling romance about a man who gets a second chance to fix his life, but still has no clue what he needs to do. Life seems to be one misstep after another for 30 year-old Shi Zhao Yu (Nick Chou) every since he lost that fateful basketball match to his college rival Li Jun Ren (Chang Chieh). He lost to him in love back in college, now he's about to lose his job. Life is no easier for his former classmate Ruby Shen (Huang Wei Ting). The girl of every guy's dream in college is now trapped in a failed marriage. Feeling depressed, Ruby calls her former classmates to meet at the clock tower, where they once shared happy memories together in college. "If only I could go back in time, maybe my life would have been different." says Ruby before she jumps off the clock tower. Just as Zhao Yu falls from trying to save Ruby, he is transported back in time to his sophomore year in college. Zhao Yu now has a chance. The opportunity to save his first love and reverse the future is in our hero's grasp. But what does he really want: another shot with his college crush, or a love that he didn't even know existed before? Love, Timeless is a Taiwanese drama that debuted on TTV on April 15, 2017. Love, Timeless is a reunion for leads Summer Meng and Huang Wei Ting, who both worked on Aim High. The cast for Love, Timeless includes Nick Chou as Shi Zhao Yu, Huang Wei Ting as Ruby Shen, Summer Meng as Zhao Kai Jia, Chang Chieh as Li Jun Ren, Johnny Yang as Liao Hai Meng, Lan Ya Yun as Wang Zhi Ni, Ryan Kuo, Miao Ke Li and Luo Bei An.

plot: Nick Chou, Summer Meng (Aim High and In Time With You), and Huang Wei Ting (Aim High) star in a time traveling romance about a man who gets a second chance to fix his life, but still has no clue what he needs to do. Life seems to be one misstep after another for 30 year-old Shi Zhao Yu (Nick Chou) every since he lost that fateful basketball match to his college rival Li Jun Ren (Chang Chieh). He lost to him in love back in college, now he's about to lose his job. Life is no easier for his former classmate Ruby Shen (Huang Wei Ting). The girl of every guy's dream in college is now trapped in a failed marriage. Feeling depressed, Ruby calls her former classmates to meet at the clock tower, where they once shared happy memories together in college. "If only I could go back in time, maybe my life would have been different." says Ruby before she jumps off the clock tower. Just as Zhao Yu falls from trying to save Ruby, he is transported back in time to his sophomore year in college. Zhao Yu now has a chance. The opportunity to save his first love and reverse the future is in our hero's grasp. But what does he really want: another shot with his college crush, or a love that he didn't even know existed before? _Love, Timeless_ (qv) is a Taiwanese drama that debuted on TTV on April 15, 2017. _Love, Timeless_ (qv) is a reunion for leads Summer Meng and Huang Wei Ting, who both worked on Aim High. The cast for _Love, Timeless_ (qv) includes Nick Chou as Shi Zhao Yu, Huang Wei Ting as Ruby Shen, Summer Meng as Zhao Kai Jia, Chang Chieh as Li Jun Ren, Johnny Yang as Liao Hai Meng, Lan Ya Yun as Wang Zhi Ni, Ryan Kuo, Miao Ke Li and Luo Bei An.
